rules.title: How to play?
rules.description: [bold]Guess the word in six tries.[/bold] Each guess must be a dictionary noun, but not a proper name. Press [bold]enter[/bold] to confirm the attempt. After each attempt, the color will tell you how close you were:
rules.wordDesc1: The letter [bold]S[/bold] is in the word exactly in this place
rules.wordDesc2: The letter [bold]L[/bold] is in the word, but not in this place
rules.wordDesc3: None of these letters are in the word

statistic.title: Statistics
statistic.winGameMsg: Congratulations! You won, keep it up.
statistic.loseGameMsg: Unfortunately you lost, maybe next time you will be lucky. The correct word is
